name: Death Of The Diseased
description:
As the earth was infected by a not so deadly dissease, EVERY HUMAN BECOMES A ZOMBIE APART FROM ONE MAN. The legendary Captain Admiral Caporal Sergent Jonh Duke Fireball Man Pew Pew, a man so american he is IMMUNE TO VIRUSES. Obviously. He's the only man that has the power to save the world. Well not really because technically- You know what, yeah, he's gonna save the world!!! 

Fight trough tons of zombies in different maps, upgrading your statistics with the aquisition of Exploration Tokens and Upgrades. Try to get a great score, getting points by getting kills. 

Play solo or with a friend in local multiplayer! Second player will need a controller.

Frequent updates will add maps and maybe features like :

Mini games

Lan and online Multiplayer

Controller play for solo

---------------------------------------------------

What are you waiting for! Go save the world kinda! The game is out!
